para.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.text: 在编译任何非 Core 方言时，编译器和运行时会有以下 "特殊 "行为

para.style: margin-top:24px; margin-bottom:0px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

list.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 允许在 NEXT、ENDDO 等关键字后使用 "垃圾"。

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 不允许使用 DOT（'.'）操作符调用实例方法

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 需要引用 XSharp.Core 和 XSharp.RT 动态链接库

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 字符串比较映射到 XSharp 运行时中的函数

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 根据编译器选项

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 的不同，NULL_STRING 会被编译为""或 NULL

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 支持字面量符号（#SomeName）

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 字符串"="操作符被映射为 XSharp 运行时中的函数

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 不支持特定的 X# 类型，如 DATE、ARRAY、SYMBOL、FLOAT 和 USUAL，但需要运行时的引用

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 添加了对动态内存变量和未声明变量的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 字符串字面量使用单引号（Vulcan 除外）。字符文字必须以 c 为前缀，如：cChar := c'A'

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 允许使用 ASend() 为 X# 数组中的每个元素调用方法。

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: ="操作符可用于赋值，但使用时会产生警告。

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加对 BEGIN SEQUENCE ... END SEQUENCE 的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加了对 ALIAS (->) 操作符的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加了对 FIELD 语句的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 支持宏编译器和 &（变量）语法

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加了对 ARRAY OF <type> 语法的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 编译器的生成函数类名为

para.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

para.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

list.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 编译器会添加几个属性（在 XSharp.Core 中定义），用于描述默认命名空间和编译器版本。

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 编译器为 EXE 文件生成代码，在 Runtimestate 中设置多个属性，以匹配编译器选项和主程序的方言。

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 过程不能具有返回值

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加了对无类型变量和返回值的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 支持未键入的函数和方法参数（所谓的 Clipper 调用约定）

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加了对后期绑定代码的支持（需要

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 编译器选项）

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 增加了对 INIT 和 EXIT 过程的支持

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 添加了对 Codeblocks 的支持（带有 USUAL 参数数组和 USUAL 返回值的非类型 Lambda 表达式）

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 允许在方法调用中跳过参数。跳过的参数被假定为 NIL

para.style: margin-top:24px; margin-bottom:0px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;

list.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ; font-family:Symbol; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.style: margin-top:14px; line-height:1.00; tabstops:720px left,1440px left,2160px left,2880px left,3600px left ;

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:12pt; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline;
font-family:'Times New Roman'; text-decoration:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000;

li.text: 默认 RDD 除 FoxPro 方言外均为 DBFNTX
